$ cat about.txt

We are an information security research group. As we learn more and more about this field, we intend to share the knowledge acquired during the learning process and publish our results, ofcourse never forgetting to help the free software community and to fight for a world without agressive/disrespectful mass surveillance.

We believe that the world can and should be free. If the hacking is the way to do that, then we will hack it :)

GPG Fingerprint: 9ECB E16A 5FD7 832D 11BB 3F49 661D 7781 12CB F8C7
